DOC.brief_title: Breath Carbon Monoxide Cotinine Biomarkers Distinguish Smokers From Nonsmokers
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To determine breath carbon monoxide ( CO ) cutoff level optimally discriminate heavy light smoker nonsmoker expose environmental tobacco smoke . Breath CO compare cotinine concentration , gold standard verify smoking status . Study population : The study include four group : 1 ) 60 smoker report > 10 cigarette per day , 2 ) 60 smoker report less equal 10 cigarette per day , 3 ) 60 nonsmoker report regular environmental exposure tobacco smoke , 4 ) 60 nonsmoker report limited environmental exposure tobacco smoke ( total 120 smoker 120 nonsmoker ) . Design : Parallel group design . Outcome Measures : 1 ) breath CO ; 2 ) semiquantitative salivary cotinine ; 3 ) quantitative salivary nicotine , cotinine , 3-hydroxycotinine ; 4 ) semiquantitative urinary cotinine ; 5 ) quantitative urinary nicotine , cotinine , norcotinine , 3-hydroxycotinine ; 6 ) self-reported smoking variable .
